body:
Chapter 1194 - The ‘Correct’ Way To Open The

Chapter 1194: The ‘Correct’ Way to Open the Holy Emperor Dragon Scale 3

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

“Xu Xiaoshou! Even the King of Heavens cannot stop me from killing you today! Go to Hell!”

The deep sea exploded with a loud bang. Water Ghost, whose face was blood red in color, held the Sea God’s Trident. His speed was extremely fast; It was almost as if he teleported and he directly jumped in the direction of Xu Xiaoshou.

“Vanishing Technique.”

Boom!

The Sea God’s Trident crashed down with a mighty bang, but the result was only a lonely explosion.

This feeling of powerlessness when his strike seemed to be punching on cotton made him feel even more frustrated.

Moreover, Water Ghost was close to his cultivation deviation. This strike missed, and he was so angry that he almost spat out a mouthful of blood.

“Xu Xiaoshou, come out!”

“…”

He disappeared, and there was no response.

“Xu Xiaoshou, come out. Let’s continue talking about the cooperation. What happened earlier… Let’s forget about it. I don’t blame you.” Water Ghost’s tone suddenly became much gentler, but the hand that was holding the Sea God’s Trident indicated otherwise… the veins bulged visibly.

“…”

There was still no response under the deep sea.

Water Ghost pressed his chest and purposefully took a deep breath. Only then did he manage to suppress all the abnormalities in his body, and there was no longer any signs of anger.

“Xu Xiaoshou, it’s indeed my fault that I insisted on sending you into the water.”

“How about this? Let’s start all over again from the beginning. Now, you can just come out and we will continue to talk about our cooperation. I won’t dwell the past anymore. How about it?” Water Ghost said calmly.

In the space above, Xu Xiaoshou’s head suddenly appeared. He asked naively, “Are you serious?”

“Bang!”.

Water Ghost pointed from afar, and the water gun turned into light spots which swished past his head.

“Damn it!”

After he disappeared, Xu Xiaoshou cursed angrily.

“He really attacked me?”

Fortunately, he had programed the Holy Emperor Dragon Scale to ‘avoid danger’.

Fortunately too for him, when he looked at the information bar, the notification ‘Sneak Attack’ popped out.

Otherwise, he would have been blown apart by Water Ghost!

“I’m not coming, I’m not coming…”

“I’ve already vented my frustrations. It’s lucky that I didn’t hit you this time. I’ll let bygones be bygones. Come out again. I promise I won’t do anything.”

Water Ghost suddenly laughed again. He spoke in a gentle voice, like a good teacher intent on educating his student.

“You bastard, you went back on your word. Who would dare to believe you now? Xu Xiaoshou thought to himself.

Xu Xiaoshou did not believe him at all and once again became like a cowardly turtle.

Suddenly, Water Ghost’s expression turned ferocious. His voice was distorted as he roared, “Xu Xiaoshou! Do you really think that I can’t do anything to you just because you disappeared? Do you really think that I only have one Holy Emperor Dragon Scale on me?”

“…”

The deep sea was silent. Only a certain person’s incompetence and fury remained.

Water Ghost regained his calm and said with a little embarrassment, “Actually you guessed it right. I really only have one Holy Emperor Dragon Scale. If you really want to hide, I really can’t do anything, but…”

He paused as if he was talking to himself and said regretfully,

“What about our cooperation? I just gave you the Holy Emperor Dragon Scale, and you’re treating me like this. This is too disappointing.”

“And your little girlfriend. The demi-saint from the Jiang clan wants to attack her. If you don’t come out, I really won’t bother about it.”

“Hehe…”

Xu Xiaoshou remained in hiding and only sneered in return.

This Holy Emperor Dragon Scale had been given to him long ago. It was clearly a compensation for kicking him into the water. Now Water Ghost was still talking about it, how could Xu Xiaoshou be so easily swayed by him?

But the Jiang clan’s demi-saint was indeed a problem…

Xu Xiaoshou thought for a moment and didn’t dare to reveal himself yet.

But he took a portrait clone of himself from the Yuan Mansion World and threw it behind Water Ghost. He controlled the portrait clone from afar and said, “Senior, you should keep your promise…”

“Bang!”

Water Ghost did not even turn his head. He pointed his finger backward and the bullet from his finger accurately pierced the throat of Xu Xiaoshou’s portrait clone.

In the deep sea, the corpse of the portrait clone turned into a mass of spiritual energy and disappeared.

Xu Xiaoshou’s scalp went numb when he saw what he did.

“You son of a bitch, you’re really out to kill me!”

“Only state officials are allowed to set fires, but the commoners are not allowed to light the lamps. Can’t you even take a joke!”
